about.title: Who We Are
about.desc:
Olive Bright Environmental Solutions (OBES) was founded in November 2021 with the aim of contributing to the world a cleaner and more sustainable place. Olive Bright Environmental Solutions Limited (OBES) is a local consulting firm led by environmental consultants with License Certificates (EIA-CO(A)-002/2023) issued by the Environmental Conservation Department of the Ministry of Natural Resources and Environmental Conservation and extensive professional experience in preparing EIA/IEE/EMP/EMoP reports in a variety of projects, as well as other professionals in specialized research and field areas.

We provide services and solutions related to environmental and social management systems, and our main intention is not only to protect our environment but also to build an excellent society, starting with our organization and environs.

We do commit our services and solutions to making our community a greener and healthier place to live without feeling guilty about our surroundings or society.

about.title: What We Do
about.desc:
Olive Bright Environmental Solutions Limited (OBES) acts as a third-party consultant firm, bringing together professionals and experts from a variety of fields to carry out the environmental impact assessments (EIAs), Initial Environmental Examinations (IEEs), Environmental Management Plans (EMPs), and EMP Monitoring Reports (EMoPs) regarding the environmental and social impacts of the development projects under the contract agreement of project proponents in accordance with Article 76 of the Environmental Impact Assessment Procedure (2015).

We adhere to the National Environmental Quality (Emission) Guidelines (2015) and the Environmental Impact Assessment Procedure (2015) by conducting field surveys to address the environmental quality setting, existing natural environment, ecosystem, socioeconomic conditions, and data collection from relevant national government websites and references to develop our environmental impact assessment reports.

The following professional services can be available from Olive Bright Environmental Solutions Limited (OBES);

  • Environmental Consultancy services
  • Drone Shooting
  • Physical Environmental Quality Surveys (Air, Water, Soil, Noise, Vibration, Odor, etc.)
  • Ecological Survey (Flora and Fauna)
  • Social Survey (Demographic and Socioeconomic conditions, Interview and Stakeholder Engagement, Public Consultations)
  • EIAs/IEEs/EMP/EMoPs reports
  • Trainings on Solid Waste and Wastewater Management Plans
